oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of fire hall and staff of Engine Company 11, Nashville Fire Department, Nashville, Tennessee, 1956 March 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the men of Engine Company 11 (located at 1204 Jefferson Street) standing in front of their fire hall honoring their leader, Captain Robert Campbell (holding award), who was retiring after being on the company roster 31 years as pipeman, lieutenant, and captain. They had a luncheon and presented him with an award stating "Outstanding service Nashville Fire Department, March 1, 1925 - March 1, 1956." The group included speakers E. T. Keeble and Robert E. Lillard, once a fireman himself. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Campbell, Robert; Keeble, E.T.; Lillard, Robert Emmitt, 1907-1991
Nashville (Tenn.). Fire Department. Engine company 11
